Bejat! Bu Guru di Bali Ajak Murid Threesome dengan Pacar
07 Nov 2019, 14:40 by Aditya Mardiastuti
Buleleng - Seorang oknum guru honorer di Buleleng, Bali, nekat mengajak muridnya untuk melakukan threesome atau seks bertiga dengan pacarnya. Kini guru dan pacarnya, yang merupakan tenaga kontrak di Pemkab Buleleng, pun ditahan.
Ulah guru bahasa Indonesia bernama Ni Made Sri Novi Darmaningsih (29) itu ketahuan karena kabar tersebut beredar di sekolah. Dari kabar tersebut, orang tua korban melaporkannya ke polisi.
"Awalnya di sekolah heboh dari mulut ke mulut sampai orang tuanya dengar terus lapor. Peristiwa tanggal 26 Oktober, dilaporkan tanggal 6 November," kata Kasubag Humas Polres Buleleng Iptu I Gede Sumarjaya saat dimintai konfirmasi via telepon, Kamis (7/11/2019).
Sumarjaya menyebutkan, saat ditangkap, Novi mengakui perbuatannya mengajak muridnya yang masih berusia 15 tahun untuk ikut meladeni kekasihnya AA Putu Wartayasa (36). Perbuatan bejat itu dilakukan Novi dan Putu di kamar kos di Jalan Sahadewa Singaraja.
"Korban merasa tertekan sehingga terjadinya perbuatan cabul," jelas Sumarjaya.
Sumarjaya menyatakan saat ini korban masih berada di bawah supervisi psikiater untuk menghilangkan traumanya. Bahkan, sebelum perbuatan bejat itu ketahuan, korban masih tetap sekolah dan menutupi traumanya.
"Korban tetap masuk sekolah seperti biasa, karena sekolah ribut dia berusaha untuk menutupi kejadian. Korban juga masih trauma dan kita konsultasi ke psikiater anak untuk menghilangkan traumanya," jelas Sumarjaya.
Akibat perbuatannya, Novi dijerat dengan Pasal 81 (1) jo pasal 82 ayat (2) Undang-Undang Nomor 35 tahun 2014 tentang Perlindungan Anak. Sementara Putu disangka telah melakukan tindak pidana persetubuhan sebagaimana dimaksudkan dalam rumusan Pasal 81 ayat (1) dan (2) UU Nomor 35 Tahun 2014.

Depraved! Teacher in Bali Invite Threesome Students with Girlfriends
Nov 7 2019, 14:40 by Aditya Mardiastuti
Buleleng - An honorary teacher in Buleleng, Bali, is determined to invite his students to have a threesome or sex with his girlfriend. Now his teacher and girlfriend, who are contract workers at the Buleleng Regency Government, are also arrested.
The Indonesian language teacher named Ni Made Sri Novi Darmaningsih (29) was found out because the news circulated at the school. From the news, the victim's parents reported it to the police.
"Initially at the school the scene of word of mouth until his parents heard it kept reporting. The incident on October 26, was reported on November 6," said Head of Public Relations Head of the Police Headquarters Iptu I Gede Sumarjaya when asked for confirmation via telephone, Thursday (11/07/2019) .
Sumarjaya said, when arrested, Novi admitted that he had invited his 15-year-old student to take part in serving his girlfriend AA Putu Wartayasa (36). Novi and Putu's depraved acts were carried out in a dorm room on Jalan Sahadewa Singaraja.
"The victim feels pressured so that obscene acts occur," explained Sumarjaya.
Sumarjaya stated that at this time the victim was still under the supervision of a psychiatrist to eliminate the trauma. Even before the depraved act was discovered, the victim still went to school and covered up her trauma.
"The victim still goes to school as usual, because the school is noisy he is trying to cover up the incident. The victim is also still traumatized and we consult a child psychiatrist to eliminate the trauma," explained Sumarjaya.
As a result of his actions, Novi was charged with Article 81 (1) in conjunction with article 82 paragraph (2) of Law Number 35 of 2014 concerning Child Protection. While Putu is suspected of committing the crime of intercourse as intended in the formulation of Article 81 paragraph (1) and (2) of Law Number 35 Year 2014.
